Your Network

People similar to another according to are linked. Nodes are sized based on sent email, and colored by individual (group?).

Songs Links

Search

Example data from last.fm. Some songs include additional links for effect.
Popular songs are defined as those with playcounts above the median for all songs in network.

{
  "nodes": [
    {
      "name": "node 1",
      "artist": "artist name",
      "id": "unique_id_1",
      "playcount": 123
    },
    {
      "name": "node 2",
      # ...
    }
  ],
  "links": [
    {
      "source": "unique_id_1",
      "target": "unique_id_2"
    },
    {
      # ...
    }
  ]
}
